verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Govinda, ari purusham, ta maha bhajami Govinda, ta maha bhajami Govinda, ari purusham, ta maha bhajami

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Ven-lem ka-vanta maravinda dala, takshan Ahh - Bar havatan sa masitan buda su daran gan Ahh - Kah-dar Poko ti kamone yavoso sha obam Govindo, ta maha bhajami

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Angani yasya sakalen, bri ja-via-tamanti Ahh - Pasyan ti-pan ti kalianti, shrirom jaganti Ahh - Ananda chin maya sadu jala vigiansya
